entities.name: Qubit
entities.description: The basic unit of quantum information.

entities.name: Superposition
entities.description: A quantum system can exist in multiple states simultaneously.

entities.name: Entanglement
entities.description: Quantum particles can be correlated in such a way that the state of one instantly influences the state of another.

entities.name: Shor's Algorithm
entities.description: A quantum algorithm for integer factorization.

entities.name: Artificial Intelligence
entities.description: The simulation of human intelligence in machines.

entities.name: Machine Learning
entities.description: Algorithms that improve automatically through experience.

entities.name: Deep Learning
entities.description: A subset of machine learning using neural networks with many layers.

entities.name: Alan Turing
entities.description: Pioneer of theoretical computer science and artificial intelligence.
